"Using the Visiphone!":
"The visiphone is an important tool for
the ARKS. It would be foolish to leave
it overlooked. If you learn to use it
properly though, you'll really climb
through the ranks!

Pay attention and learn to use it.

Now if you'll excuse me, I have to use
the visiphone myself..."
"Perform a Player Search or ARKS Search using the Visiphone."
